00036 WSESWrapperMain::WSESWrapperMain()
00037 : initialized_(false), currentStep_(0), currentPoint_(std::numeric_limits<int>::min()), sesSpectrum_(0), sesSignals_(0)
00038 {
00039   // Create data parameter database

00074 WSESWrapperMain::~WSESWrapperMain()
00075 {
00076   abortAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00077   if (lib_->isLoaded())
00078   {
00079     if (initialized_)
00080       lib_->GDS_Finalize();
00081     lib_->unload();
00082   }
00083 }

00090 WSESWrapperMain *WSESWrapperMain::instance()
00091 {
00092   if (this_ == 0)
00093   {
00094     this_ = new WSESWrapperMain;
00095   }
00096   references_++;
00097   return this_;
00098 }

00104 void WSESWrapperMain::release()
00105 {
00106   if (references_ == 1)
00107   {
00108     delete this_;
00109     this_ = 0;
00110     references_ = 0;
00111   }
00112   else if (references_ > 0)
00113     references_--;
00114 }

00152 int WSESWrapperMain::initialize(void *reserved)
00153 {
00154   int errorCode = WError::ERR_OK;
00155 
00156   if (initialized_)
00157     return WError::ERR_OK;
00158 
00159   instrumentLoaded_ = false;
00160   
00161   instrumentLibraryName_ = workingDir_;
00162   if (workingDir_.empty())
00163     instrumentLibraryName_ = "dll\\SESInstrument.dll";
00164   else
00165     instrumentLibraryName_.append("\\dll\\SESInstrument.dll");
00166 
00167   std:string path = workingDir_;
00168   path.append("/ini/Ses.ini");
00169   int bufferLength = 2048;
00170   char* fromFileResult = new char[bufferLength];
00171   memset(fromFileResult, 0, bufferLength);
00172 
00173   DWORD length = GetPrivateProfileString("Global", "Detector Interface", "None", fromFileResult, bufferLength, path.c_str());
00174   path = fromFileResult;
00175   std::replace(path.begin(), path.end(), '\\', ' ');
00176   if (path == "dll Detector Detector_Graph.dll")
00177   {
00178     path = workingDir_;
00179     path.append("/ini/DetectorGraph.ini");
00180     bufferLength = 2048;
00181     length = GetPrivateProfileString("global", "direct_viewer", "None", fromFileResult, bufferLength, path.c_str());
00182     path = fromFileResult;
00183     if (path == "true")
00184       return WError::ERR_QT_RUNNING;
00185   }
00186   delete[] fromFileResult;
00187 
00188         char *tmpDir = _getcwd(0, 0);
00189 
00190   if (!lib_->isLoaded() && !lib_->load(instrumentLibraryName_.c_str()))
00191     errorCode = WError::ERR_LOAD_LIBRARY;
00192 
00193   if (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK && lib_->GDS_Initialize(errorNotify, 0) != 0)
00194     errorCode = WError::ERR_INITIALIZE_FAIL;
00195 
00196   _chdir(tmpDir);
00197   free(tmpDir);
00198   
00199   initialized_ = (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK);
00200 
00201   return errorCode;
00202 }
00203 
00215 int WSESWrapperMain::finalize()
00216 {
00217   instrumentLoaded_ = false;
00218   initialized_ = false;
00219 
00220   abortAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00221   
00222   if (lib_->isLoaded())
00223   {
00224     lib_->GDS_Finalize();
00225     lib_->unload();
00226   }
00227   
00228   return WError::ERR_OK;
00229 }

00252 int WSESWrapperMain::getProperty(const char *property, int index, void *value, int &size)
00253 {
00254   PropertyMap::iterator it = properties_.find(property);
00255   if (it == properties_.end())
00256     return (lib_->SC_GetProperty != 0 && lib_->SC_GetProperty(property, value, &size) == 0) ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND;
00257   return it->second.get(index, value, size);
00258 }
00259 
00265 int WSESWrapperMain::getProperty(const char *name, int index, void *value)
00266 {
00267   int size = 0;
00268   return getProperty(name, index, value, size);
00269 }
00270 
00285 int WSESWrapperMain::setProperty(const char *property, int size, const void *value)
00286 {
00287   PropertyMap::iterator it = properties_.find(property);
00288   if (it == properties_.end())
00289   {
00290     if (lib_->SC_SetPropertyEx != 0)
00291       return lib_->SC_SetPropertyEx(property, value, size) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00292     if (lib_->SC_SetProperty != 0)
00293       return lib_->SC_SetProperty(property, value) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00294     return WError::ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND;
00295   }
00296   return it->second.set(size, value);
00297 }
00298 
00313 int WSESWrapperMain::validate(const char *elementSet, const char *lensMode, double passEnergy, double kineticEnergy)
00314 {
00315   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00316     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00317 
00318   int i = 0; 
00319 
00320   if (std::find(elementSets_.begin(), elementSets_.end(), elementSet) == elementSets_.end())
00321     return WError::ERR_INCORRECT_ELEMENT_SET;
00322 
00323   if (std::find(lensModes_.begin(), lensModes_.end(), lensMode) == lensModes_.end())
00324     return WError::ERR_INCORRECT_LENS_MODE;
00325 
00326   DoubleVector passEnergies;
00327   loadPassEnergies(lensMode, passEnergies);
00328   if (std::find(passEnergies.begin(), passEnergies.end(), passEnergy) == passEnergies.end())
00329     return WError::ERR_INCORRECT_PASS_ENERGY;
00330 
00331   return WError::ERR_OK;
00332 }

00344   return lib_->GDS_ResetInstrument() == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00345 }

00369 int WSESWrapperMain::loadInstrument(const char *fileName)
00370 {
00371   instrumentLoaded_ = false;
00372   memset(&sesInstrumentInfo_, 0, sizeof(SesNS::WInstrumentInfo));
00373 
00374   if (!initialized_)
00375     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00376 
00377   if (*fileName == 0)
00378   {
00379     std:string path = workingDir_;
00380     path.append("/ini/Ses.ini");
00381     int bufferLength = 2048;
00382     char* fromFileResult = new char[bufferLength];
00383     memset(fromFileResult, 0, bufferLength);
00384     DWORD length = GetPrivateProfileString("Global", "Instrument Prefs", "None", fromFileResult, bufferLength, path.c_str());
00385     path = workingDir_;
00386     path.append("\\");
00387     path.append(fromFileResult);
00388     delete[] fromFileResult;
00389     return loadInstrument(path.c_str());
00390   }
00391 
00392   if (*fileName == 0)
00393     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
00394 
00395   lib_->GDS_GetDetectorInfo(&sesDetectorInfo_);
00396   int errorCode = WError::ERR_OK;
00397   if (lib_->GDS_LoadInstrument(fileName) == 0)
00398   {
00399     lib_->GDS_GetInstrumentInfo(&sesInstrumentInfo_);
00400     int length = *sesInstrumentInfo_.Model;
00401     memcpy(sesInstrumentInfo_.Model, sesInstrumentInfo_.Model + 1, length);
00402     sesInstrumentInfo_.Model[length] = 0;
00403     length = *sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo;
00404     memcpy(sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo, sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo + 1, length);
00405     sesInstrumentInfo_.SerialNo[length] = 0;
00406     instrumentLoaded_ = true;
00407 
00408     loadElementSets();
00409     loadLensModes();
00410     if (lensModes_.size() > 0)
00411       loadPassEnergies(lensModes_[0], passEnergies_);
00412     loadElementNames();
00413     if (elementNames_.size() == 0)
00414       errorCode = WError::ERR_FAIL;
00415   }
00416   else
00417     errorCode = WError::ERR_OPEN_INSTRUMENT;
00418 
00419   lib_->GDS_GetGlobalDetector(&sesDetectorRegion_);
00420   sesRegion_.ADCMask = sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMask;
00421   sesRegion_.ADCMode = sesDetectorRegion_.ADCMode;
00422   sesRegion_.DiscLvl = sesDetectorRegion_.DiscLvl;
00423   sesRegion_.FirstXChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstXChannel;
00424   sesRegion_.FirstYChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.FirstYChannel;
00425   sesRegion_.LastXChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.LastXChannel;
00426   sesRegion_.LastYChannel = sesDetectorRegion_.LastYChannel;
00427   sesRegion_.Slices = sesDetectorRegion_.Slices;
00428 
00429   return errorCode;
00430 }

00596 int WSESWrapperMain::checkAnalyzerRegion(WAnalyzerRegion *analyzerRegion, int *steps, double *time_ms, double *minEnergyStep_eV)
00597 {
00598   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00599     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00600 
00601   int error = lib_->GDS_CheckRegion(&sesRegion_, steps, time_ms, minEnergyStep_eV);
00602   analyzerRegion->centerEnergy_ = sesRegion_.FixEnergy;
00603   analyzerRegion->dwellTime_ = sesRegion_.StepTime;
00604   analyzerRegion->energyStep_ = sesRegion_.EnergyStep;
00605   analyzerRegion->fixed_ = sesRegion_.Fixed;
00606   analyzerRegion->highEnergy_ = sesRegion_.HighEnergy;
00607   analyzerRegion->lowEnergy_ = sesRegion_.LowEnergy;
00608   return error == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_INCORRECT_ANALYZER_REGION;
00609 }
00610 
00626 int WSESWrapperMain::initAcquisition(const bool blockPointReady, const bool blockRegionReady)
00627 {
00628   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00629     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00630 
00631   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00632   if (lib_->GDS_GetStatus != 0)
00633     lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00634 
00635   if (sesStatus == SesNS::Running)
00636     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
00637 
00638   abortAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
00639   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00640   regionReadyEvent_.reset();
00641   continueAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
00642 
00643   blockPointReady_ = blockPointReady;
00644   blockRegionReady_ = blockRegionReady;
00645   iteration_ = 0;
00646   sesSpectrum_ = 0;
00647   currentStep_ = 0;
00648   currentPoint_ = std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
00649 
00650   int result = 0;
00651 
00652   if (tempFileName_.empty())
00653     tempFileName_ = "work\\seswrapper";
00654   DeleteFile(tempFileName_.c_str());
00655 
00656   if (lib_->GDS_InitAcquisition != 0)
00657   {
00658     result = lib_->GDS_InitAcquisition(&sesRegion_, &sesSpectrum_, &sesSignals_, tempFileName_.c_str(), WSESWrapperMain::pointReady, WSESWrapperMain::regionReady);
00659   }
00660 
00661   startTime_ = clock();
00662 
00663   return result == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00664 }
00665 
00684 int WSESWrapperMain::startAcquisition()
00685 {
00686   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00687     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00688 
00689   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00690   lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00691   if (sesStatus == SesNS::Running)
00692     return WError::ERR_ACQUIRING;
00693   startTime_ = clock();
00694   abortAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
00695   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00696   regionReadyEvent_.reset();
00697   currentStep_ = 0;
00698 
00699   if (lib_->GDS_UseDetector != 0)
00700     lib_->GDS_UseDetector((activeDetectors_ & 0x0001) != 0);
00701   if (lib_->GDS_UseSignals != 0)
00702   {
00703     lib_->GDS_UseSignals((activeDetectors_ & 0x0002) != 0);
00704   }
00705 
00706   int result = 0;
00707   
00708   if (resetDataBetweenIterations_)
00709     iteration_ = 1;
00710   else
00711     iteration_++;
00712 
00713   result = lib_->GDS_Start(&sesRegion_, &sesSpectrum_, tempFileName_.c_str(), iteration_, WSESWrapperMain::pointReady, WSESWrapperMain::regionReady);
00714 
00715   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals != 0)
00716     lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals(&sesSignals_);
00717 
00718   return result == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00719 }
00720 
00728 int WSESWrapperMain::stopAcquisition()
00729 {
00730   if (!lib_->isLoaded())
00731     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00732 
00733   abortAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00734   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00735   regionReadyEvent_.reset();
00736 
00737   return lib_->GDS_Stop() == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
00738 }
00739 
00754 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcquiredData(const char *variable, int index, void *data, int &size)
00755 {
00756   DataParameterMap::iterator it = dataParameters_.find(variable);
00757   if (it == dataParameters_.end())
00758     return WError::ERR_PARAMETER_NOT_FOUND;
00759 
00760   return it->second.get(index, data, size);
00761 }
00762 
00780 int WSESWrapperMain::waitForPointReady(int timeout_ms)
00781 {
00782   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00783     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00784 
00785   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00786   lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00787 
00788   if (sesStatus != SesNS::Running)
00789     return WError::ERR_OK;
00790 
00791   const HANDLE handles[] = {pointReadyEvent_.handle(), abortAcquisitionEvent_.handle()};
00792   DWORD result = WaitForMultipleObjects(2, handles, FALSE, timeout_ms);
00793   return result == WAIT_TIMEOUT ? WError::ERR_TIMEOUT : WError::ERR_OK;
00794 }
00795 
00812 int WSESWrapperMain::waitForRegionReady(int timeout_ms)
00813 {
00814   if (!instrumentLoaded_)
00815     return WError::ERR_NO_INSTRUMENT;
00816 
00817   int sesStatus = SesNS::NonOperational;
00818   lib_->GDS_GetStatus(&sesStatus);
00819 
00820   if (sesStatus != SesNS::Running)
00821     return WError::ERR_OK;
00822 
00823   const HANDLE handles[] = {regionReadyEvent_.handle(), abortAcquisitionEvent_.handle()};
00824   DWORD result = WaitForMultipleObjects(2, handles, FALSE, timeout_ms);
00825   return result == WAIT_TIMEOUT ? WError::ERR_TIMEOUT : WError::ERR_OK;
00826 }
00827 
00836 int WSESWrapperMain::continueAcquisition()
00837 {
00838   pointReadyEvent_.reset();
00839   continueAcquisitionEvent_.set();
00840   return WError::ERR_OK;
00841 }
00842 
00848 int WSESWrapperMain::parameterType(const char *name)
00849 {
00850   PropertyMap::iterator p = properties_.find(name);
00851   if (p != properties_.end())
00852     return p->second.valueType();
00853 
00854   DataParameterMap::iterator dp = dataParameters_.find(name);
00855   if (dp != dataParameters_.end())
00856     return dp->second.valueType();
00857 
00858   return -1;
00859 }

00876   {
00877     int *intData = reinterpret_cast<int *>(data);

00879   }
00880         return WError::ERR_OK;
00881 }

00901 
00914 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqIterations(int index, void *data, int &size)
00915 {
00916   if (data != 0)
00917   {
00918     int *intData = reinterpret_cast<int *>(data);
00919     *intData = readSpectrumObject() ? sesSpectrum_->Sweeps : 0;
00920   }
00921         return WError::ERR_OK;
00922 }

01032 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqImage(int index, void *data, int &size)
01033 {
01034   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01035     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01036 
01037   if (data != 0)
01038   {
01039     double *doubleData = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01040     int sliceSize = sesSpectrum_->Channels * sizeof(double);
01041       for (int slice = 0; slice < sesSpectrum_->Slices; slice++, doubleData += sesSpectrum_->Channels)
01042         memcpy(doubleData, sesSpectrum_->Data[slice], sliceSize);
01043   }
01044   size = sesSpectrum_->Channels * sesSpectrum_->Slices;
01045         return WError::ERR_OK;
01046 }

01117 
01140 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqRawImage(int index, void *data, int &size)
01141 {
01142   unsigned char *uCharData = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char *>(data);
01143   int errorCode = lib_->GDS_GetRawImage != 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01144   int width = sesDetectorInfo_.XChannels;
01145   int height = sesDetectorInfo_.YChannels;
01146   int byteSize = 1;
01147 
01148   if (size < width * height * byteSize)
01149           errorCode = WError::ERR_INCORRECT_DETECTOR_REGION;
01150   
01151   if (errorCode == WError::ERR_OK)
01152   {
01153     if (data != 0)
01154       errorCode = lib_->GDS_GetRawImage(uCharData, &width, &height, &byteSize) == 0 ? WError::ERR_OK : WError::ERR_FAIL;
01155     size = width * height * byteSize;
01156   }
01157         return errorCode;
01158 }
01159

01359 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqIOData(int index, void *data, int &size)
01360 {
01361   if (!readSignalsObject())
01362     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01363 
01364   if (data != 0)
01365   {
01366     double *doubleData = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01367     int channelSize = sesSignals_->Steps * sizeof(double);
01368       for (int channel = 0; channel < sesSignals_->Count; channel++, doubleData += channelSize)
01369         memcpy(doubleData, sesSignals_->Data[channel], channelSize);
01370   }
01371   size = sesSignals_->Count * sesSignals_->Steps;
01372   return WError::ERR_OK;
01373 }

01387 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqIOPortName(int index, void *data, int &size)
01388 {
01389   if (!readSignalsObject())
01390     return WError::ERR_FAIL;
01391   
01392   if (data != 0)
01393   {
01394     if (index < 0 || index >= sizeof(SesNS::Char32))
01395       return WError::ERR_INDEX;
01396     memcpy(data, sesSignals_->Names[index], std::min(size, (int)sizeof(SesNS::Char32)));
01397   }
01398   size = strlen(sesSignals_->Names[index]);
01399         return WError::ERR_OK;
01400 }

01419   return WError::ERR_OK;

01421 
01435 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqPointIntensity(int index, void *data, int &size)
01436 {
01437   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01438     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01439 
01440   if (data != 0)
01441   {
01442     double *doubleValue = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01443 
01444     if (index < 0 || index >= sesSpectrum_->Channels)
01445     {
01446       *doubleValue = 0;
01447       return WError::ERR_OK;
01448     }
01449   
01450     *doubleValue = sesSpectrum_->SumData[index];
01451   }
01452   return WError::ERR_OK;
01453 }
01454 
01468 int WSESWrapperMain::getAcqChannelIntensity(int index, void *data, int &size)
01469 {
01470   if (!readSpectrumObject())
01471     return WError::ERR_NOT_INITIALIZED;
01472 
01473   if (data != 0)
01474   {
01475     double *doubleVector = reinterpret_cast<double *>(data);
01476     double *p = doubleVector;
01477 
01478     if (index < 0 || index >= sesSpectrum_->Channels)
01479     {
01480       for (int r = 0; r < sesSpectrum_->Slices; r++)
01481         *p++ = 0;
01482     }
01483     else
01484     {
01485       for (int r = 0; r < sesSpectrum_->Slices; r++)
01486         *p++ = sesSpectrum_->Data[r][index];
01487     }
01488   }
01489 
01490   size = sesSpectrum_->Slices;
01491   return WError::ERR_OK;
01492 }

01494 // Private WSESWrapperMain members
01495 
01502 void __stdcall WSESWrapperMain::errorNotify(int errorCode)
01503 {
01504   this_->errorNotifyHandler(errorCode);
01505 }
01506 
01510 void WSESWrapperMain::errorNotifyHandler(int errorCode)
01511 {
01512   const char *buffer = lib_->GDS_GetLastErrorString();
01513   std::ofstream oFile("seswrapper.log", std::ios::out | std::ios::app);
01514   time_t t = time(0);
01515   std::string tStr = ctime(&t);
01516   int pos = tStr.find('\n');
01517   if (pos != tStr.npos)
01518     tStr = tStr.substr(0, pos);
01519   oFile << "[" << tStr << "] SesInstrument Error " << errorCode << ": " << buffer << std::endl;
01520 }
01521 
01531 void __stdcall WSESWrapperMain::pointReady(int point)
01532 {
01533   this_->pointReadyHandler(point);
01534 }
01535 
01539 void WSESWrapperMain::pointReadyHandler(int point)
01540 {
01541   currentStep_++;
01542   currentPoint_ = point;
01543   pointReadyEvent_.set();
01544 
01545   if (blockPointReady_)
01546   {
01547     HANDLE handles[] = {continueAcquisitionEvent_.handle(), abortAcquisitionEvent_.handle()};
01548     WaitForMultipleObjects(2, handles, FALSE, INFINITE);
01549     continueAcquisitionEvent_.reset();
01550   }
01551 }
01552 
01560 void __stdcall WSESWrapperMain::regionReady()
01561 {
01562   this_->regionReadyHandler();
01563 }
01564 
01568 void WSESWrapperMain::regionReadyHandler()
01569 {
01570   regionReadyEvent_.set();
01571 }
01572 
01578 bool WSESWrapperMain::readSpectrumObject()
01579 {
01580   SesNS::WSpectrum *tmpSpectrum = sesSpectrum_;
01581   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrSpectrum != 0)
01582     lib_->GDS_GetCurrSpectrum(&tmpSpectrum);
01583   if (tmpSpectrum != 0)
01584     sesSpectrum_ = tmpSpectrum;
01585   return (sesSpectrum_ != 0);
01586 }
01587 
01593 bool WSESWrapperMain::readSignalsObject()
01594 {
01595   SesNS::WSignals *tmpSignals = sesSignals_;
01596   if (lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals != 0)
01597     lib_->GDS_GetCurrSignals(&tmpSignals);
01598   if (tmpSignals != 0)
01599     sesSignals_ = tmpSignals;
01600   return (sesSignals_ != 0);
01601 }
